title.rendered: Planning a Bachelorette Party in the Great Outdoors

content.rendered:
Planning a Bachelorette Party in the Great Outdoors

If you are considering planning an outdoorsy bachelorette party, then the Rocky Mountains are where you want to be! If your bride-to-be is an adventurous person who loves every aspect of the great outdoors, then AVA Rafting & Zip Line has plenty of options to choose from for creating the most epic party! Here are 5 stand-out getaway ideas for a group of women trying to have an experience of a lifetime in the great outdoors for an upcoming bachelorette party!

Is your group looking for an ultimate overnight white water wilderness rafting experience in Colorado? Then I would suggest taking a look at the 3 Day Mild to Wild with AVA. This is going to be a perfect trip for an adventurous bunch of gals who have experience being on the water. It starts out above Browns Canyon in the Arkansas Valley and ends getting wild in Class lV & V. What is neat about this trip is it is the ultimate package that offers it all. From rock climbing and rappelling to enjoying yourself in inflatable kayaks to experiencing all levels of whitewater on the Arkansas River, you will surely not be disappointed!

 

 

If you are looking for an option that allows you to be adventurous during the day, but kick back and relax in a cabin at night after a long day, then AVA has plenty of options for you! At AVA’s Granite Outpost, we offer 5 cabins conveniently close to everything. We offer class ll-V whitewater trips, rock climbing, zip line tours and even horseback riding trips. So, see what all of the girls want to do and give our helpful Sales Agents a call at AVA and we will be able to build the perfect trip that your bachelorette party is looking for!

Staying in Breckenridge? Then come join us for a once in a lifetime opportunity high in the sky of the Rocky Mountains. That’s right, we offer Hot Air Balloon Rides that take place at sunrise. Some other ideas is to spend part of your day going on the Blue River Express whitewater rafting trip, horseback riding, hiking, biking and even spend some time in the lovely town of Breckenridge.

Looking to stay close to Denver but still want some adventure? Then our Idaho Springs Outpost is just for you! With being about 40 minutes from the big city but do not have transportation, no need to worry! Give Peak 1 Express a call for Private Transportation to our AVA location. Depending on level of experience throughout the group, we offer ½ day, ¾ day and full day rafting trips as well as Zip Line + Rafting Packages!

Last but not least, the 3 Days on the Upper Colorado! This is an experience full of fun in the sun that you will never forget. Floating through beautiful canyons, playing in inflatable kayaks and trying out our stand up paddle boards, followed by riverside camping with hearty meals and a view of the well-known Colorado stars are sure to give everyone their adventure fill! AVA’s remote 3 Day Overnight trip offers a quintessential Colorado experience.

Now that you have plently of options to choose from for a Bachelorette Party in the great outdoors, all you need to do now is give AVA a call to make a reservation and let us handle the rest!
